treatmentsSection.title: Treatment Methods
treatmentsSection.description: Our physical therapy treatment methods include a range of solutions to meet your individual needs.

hero.mainHeading: Help people improve their movement health in a

form.heading: Get consultation in 30s
form.successMessage: We will contact you as soon as possible.
form.errorMessage: An error occurred while submitting. Please try again later.
form.phoneValidation: Phone number must be at least 10 digits.

therapy.title: Therapy
therapy.description: Multi-method therapy to improve all musculoskeletal pain, injury, and bone conditions

consultation.title: Deep Consultation
consultation.description: Expert functional health assessment and personalized treatment plans for each customer

muscleRelaxation.title: Muscle Relaxation
muscleRelaxation.description: Reduce muscle tension, improve movement health

basicTraining.title: Basic Training
basicTraining.description: 1-on-1 coaching with rehab exercises to improve posture and post-injury recovery

servicesPage.title: Specialized Treatment Methods
servicesPage.description: Choose the problem you're facing to find the most suitable treatment method

problemSelection.emptyState: No problem categories found. Please add categories in Sanity Studio.

emptyState.noTreatmentsDesc: Services do not have specific treatment protocols yet. Please contact us for consultation.
emptyState.noMatchesDesc: Please select a different problem or contact us for more consultation

booking.title: Book Consultation
booking.notePlaceholder: Example: I would like to book in the morning...

validation.nameFormat: Full name can only contain letters

toast.successMessage: Your booking request has been sent. We will contact you soon!

cupping.title: Cupping
cupping.description: Method using vacuum suction to relieve pain and relax muscles.

tapping.title: Tapping
tapping.description: Light tapping method to stimulate muscles and nerves, reduce stress and improve circulation.

heatLight.title: Infrared Light
heatLight.description: Therapy using infrared light to warm muscles, improve blood circulation and relieve pain.

iastm.title: IASTM (Soft Tissue Mobilization Tool)
iastm.description: Technique using specialized tools to stimulate and improve soft tissue, reduce pain and enhance recovery.

coldPlunge.title: Cold Plunge
coldPlunge.description: Cold water therapy to reduce pain and improve circulation.

dryNeedling.title: Dry Needling
dryNeedling.description: Technique using small needles to stimulate muscle trigger points and relieve chronic pain.

dds.title: Bioelectric Therapy (DDS)
dds.description: Therapy using light electrical current to stimulate muscles and nerves, relieve pain and promote recovery.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: At Holistic Physical Therapy Clinic, we are committed to protecting your privacy and personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our clinic or use our services.

informationCollection.title: Information We Collect
informationCollection.content: We collect information that you provide directly to us, including:
items: Personal identification information (name, date of birth, contact details)
Health and medical information relevant to your treatment

useOfInformation.title: How We Use Your Information
useOfInformation.content: We use the information we collect to:
items: Provide, maintain, and improve our physical therapy services
Process appointments and communicate with you about your treatment
Send you appointment reminders and health-related information
Comply with legal obligations and regulations

informationSharing.title: Information Sharing and Disclosure
informationSharing.content: We may share your information with:
items: Healthcare providers involved in your care
Insurance companies for billing and claims processing
Legal authorities when required by law
Service providers who assist in our operations (subject to confidentiality agreements)

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure.

yourRights.title: Your Rights
items: Access and receive a copy of your personal information
Request correction of inaccurate or incomplete information
Request deletion of your information (subject to legal requirements)
Withdraw consent for certain uses of your information
File a complaint with relevant data protection authorities

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us through the information provided on our website.
